paper_abstract: In this manuscript novel architectures for modulo 2(n) + 1 multi-operand addition and residue generation are introduced. The proposed arithmetic components consist of a translation stage, an inverted end-around-carry carry-save-adder tree and an enhanced diminished-1 modulo 2(n) + 1 adder. Qualitative and quantitative results indicate that the proposed architectures result in significantly faster and in several cases smaller circuits than the previously proposed. (C) 2009 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Fast modulo 2(n)+1 multi-operand adders and residue generators
